name: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
title: Bygone Azure Teardrop: Tulaytullah's Remembrance
desc: "In the end, all people, good or evil, will find themselves ground beneath the wheels of fate, and the sapphire city would fade, dissipating like tears beneath the scorching sun."
in_play_description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When the character uses a Charged Attack: Spend 1 less Unaligned Element. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round)

skills.desc: The character deals +1 DMG. When the character uses a Charged Attack: Spend 1 less Unaligned Element. (Can be triggered up to twice per Round) (Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
